sub_fields.label: Post Types
sub_fields.name: post_types
sub_fields.instructions: Allowed Post type to be filtered.

sub_fields.label: WYSIWYG
sub_fields.name: wysiwyg
sub_fields.instructions:
• Images are set to Medium size by default. You may need to set a size or re-size the image via stretching if you want to display the Image Full-size in the Frontend.
  • For Pull Quote attribution, Use Heading 5 within the quote tag.
